newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian pound averages 3.3885/3.3910 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian pound averages 3.3885/3.3910 to dlr.

text.p: Private-sector Cairo banks quoted the dollar at 3.3850 to 3.3920 pounds bid and 3.3860 to 3.3950 pounds offered in the interbank market on Thursday.
A survey of five actively trading banks gave average rates of 3.3885 pounds bid and 3.3910 pounds offered. The averages compared with 3.3859 and 3.3890 pounds on Wednesday.
The central bank calculated the average exchange rate at the opening at 3.390452 buy and 3.397205 sell. -- Cairo newsroom +20 2 578 3290/1
